```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r by-name, echo = F, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
cars %>%
  ggplot(aes(speed,dist))+geom_point()

```

```{r echo = F}
knitr::kable(
mtcars[1:5, ],
caption = "A knitr kable."
)
```
